vulnerabilities.remediation: Set Secure, HttpOnly, and SameSite attributes on session cookies

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: X-Content-Type-Options
vulnerabilities.description: Security header X-Content-Type-Options is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: X-Content-Type-Options not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add X-Content-Type-Options header. Prevents MIME type sniffing attacks

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: X-Frame-Options
vulnerabilities.description: Security header X-Frame-Options is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: X-Frame-Options not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add X-Frame-Options header. Prevents clickjacking attacks

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: X-XSS-Protection
vulnerabilities.description: Security header X-XSS-Protection is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: X-XSS-Protection not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add X-XSS-Protection header. Enables XSS filtering in browsers

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: Strict-Transport-Security
vulnerabilities.description: Security header Strict-Transport-Security is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: Strict-Transport-Security not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add Strict-Transport-Security header. Enforces HTTPS connections

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: Content-Security-Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Security header Content-Security-Policy is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: Content-Security-Policy not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add Content-Security-Policy header. Prevents XSS and data injection attacks

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: Referrer-Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Security header Referrer-Policy is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: Referrer-Policy not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add Referrer-Policy header. Controls referrer information

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: Permissions-Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Security header Permissions-Policy is missing
vulnerabilities.evidence: Header: Permissions-Policy not found in response
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add Permissions-Policy header. Controls browser features

vulnerabilities.title: Information Disclosure Header: Server
vulnerabilities.description: Server information disclosed in Server header
vulnerabilities.remediation: Remove or obfuscate Server header

vulnerabilities.title: HTTP Used Instead of HTTPS
vulnerabilities.description: Application is not using HTTPS encryption
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement HTTPS with proper SSL/TLS configuration

vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Data Transmission
vulnerabilities.description: Application uses HTTP instead of HTTPS
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement HTTPS for all communications
